bytecodes.Name: ICONST_0
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_0 - Load the value 0 onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: ICONST_1
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_1 - Load the value 1 onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: ICONST_2
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_2 - Load the value 2 onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: ICONST_3
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_3 - Load the value 3 onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: ICONST_4
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_4 - Load the value 4 onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: ICONST_5
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_5 - Load the value 5 onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: BIPUSH
bytecodes.Tooltip: BIPUSH - Push a byte onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: SIPUSH
bytecodes.Tooltip: SIPUSH - Push a short onto the stack

bytecodes.Name: ILOAD
bytecodes.Tooltip: ILOAD - Load a value from given index of Local Variable Frame

bytecodes.Name: ILOAD_0
bytecodes.Tooltip: ILOAD_0 - Load a value from Local Variable Frame 0

bytecodes.Name: ILOAD_1
bytecodes.Tooltip: ILOAD_1 - Load a value from Local Variable Frame 1

bytecodes.Name: ILOAD_2
bytecodes.Tooltip: ILOAD_2 - Load a value from Local Variable Frame 2

bytecodes.Name: ILOAD_3
bytecodes.Tooltip: ILOAD_3 - Load a value from Local Variable Frame 3

bytecodes.Name: ISTORE
bytecodes.Tooltip: ISTORE - Store Value from top of Stack into given index of Local Variable Frame

bytecodes.Name: ISTORE_0
bytecodes.Tooltip: ISTORE_0 - Store Value from top of Stack into Local Variable Frame 0

bytecodes.Name: ISTORE_1
bytecodes.Tooltip: ISTORE_1 - Store Value from top of Stack into Local Variable Frame 1

bytecodes.Name: ISTORE_2
bytecodes.Tooltip: ISTORE_2 - Store Value from top of Stack into Local Variable Frame 2

bytecodes.Name: ISTORE_3
bytecodes.Tooltip: ISTORE_3 - Store Value from top of Stack into Local Variable Frame 3

bytecodes.Name: IADD
bytecodes.Tooltip: IADD - Add together the 2 integers on the top of Stack. Push the Result onto the Stack

bytecodes.Name: ISUB
bytecodes.Tooltip: ISUB - Sub together the 2 integers on the top of Stack. Push the Result onto the Stack

bytecodes.Name: DUP
bytecodes.Tooltip: DUP - Duplicate the value on the top of the Stack

bytecodes.Name: IAND
bytecodes.Tooltip: IAND - Perform AND operation on the 2 values on the top of Stack

bytecodes.Name: IFEQ
bytecodes.Tooltip: IFEQ - If value is 0, branch to the line number given

bytecodes.Name: IFNE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IFEQ - If value is not 0, branch to line number in operand

bytecodes.Name: IFLT
bytecodes.Tooltip: IFLT - If value is less than 0, branch to the line number given

bytecodes.Name: IFGE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IFGE - If value is greater than or equal to 0, branch to operand number

bytecodes.Name: IFGT
bytecodes.Tooltip: IFGT - If value is greater than 0, branch to operand number

bytecodes.Name: IFLE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IFLE - If value is less than or equal to 0, branch to operand number

bytecodes.Name: IINC
bytecodes.Tooltip: IINC - Increment the chosen local variable by given number

bytecodes.Name: LDC_W
bytecodes.Tooltip: LDC_W - Push constant from constant pool onto Stack

bytecodes.Name: NOP
bytecodes.Tooltip: NOP - Perform no operation

bytecodes.Name: POP
bytecodes.Tooltip: POP - Discard the top value on the Stack

bytecodes.Name: SWAP
bytecodes.Tooltip: SWAP - Swap the top 2 values on the Stack

bytecodes.Name: IF_ICMPGE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IF_ICMPGE - If first value is greater than or equal to the second value, then branch

bytecodes.Name: IF_ICMPGT
bytecodes.Tooltip: IF_ICMPGE - If first value is greater than the second value, then branch

bytecodes.Name: IF_ICMPLE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IF_ICMPLE - If first value is less than or equal to the second value, then branch

bytecodes.Name: IF_ICMPLT
bytecodes.Tooltip: IF_ICMPLE - If first value is less than the second value, then branch

bytecodes.Name: IF_ICMPNE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IF_ICMPNE - If the two values are not equal, then branch

bytecodes.Name: IF_ICMPEQ
bytecodes.Tooltip: IF_ICMPEQ - Branch to given line number if the value 1 and value 2 are equal

bytecodes.Name: GOTO
bytecodes.Tooltip: GOTO - Branch to the given line number

bytecodes.Name: WIDE
bytecodes.Tooltip: WIDE - Used for when the opcode is 16-bits long

bytecodes.Name: RETURN
bytecodes.Tooltip: RETURN - Return void from method

bytecodes.Name: ALOAD_0
bytecodes.Tooltip: ALOAD_0 - Load a Reference from local variable 0

bytecodes.Name: INVOKESPECIAL
bytecodes.Tooltip: INVOKESPECIAL - Invoke instance method (Constructor). Includes an operand. Operand is reference in constant pool to method to invoke.

bytecodes.Name: INVOKESTATIC
bytecodes.Tooltip: INVOKESTATIC - Invoke a static method. Includes an operand. Operand is reference to constant pool to method to invoke.

bytecodes.Name: LOOKUPSWITCH
bytecodes.Tooltip: LOOKUPSWITCH - A Switch Statement

bytecodes.Name: LSTORE
bytecodes.Tooltip: LSTORE - Store a Long value in a specified local variable index

bytecodes.Name: LSTORE_0
bytecodes.Tooltip: LSTORE_0 - Store a Long value in local variable zero

bytecodes.Name: LSTORE_1
bytecodes.Tooltip: LSTORE_1 - Store a Long value in local variable one

bytecodes.Name: LSTORE_2
bytecodes.Tooltip: LSTORE_2 - Store a Long value in local variable two

bytecodes.Name: LSTORE_3
bytecodes.Tooltip: LSTORE_3 - Store a Long value in local variable three

bytecodes.Name: LDC2_W
bytecodes.Tooltip: LDC2_W - Push a value (double or long) from constant pool onto the operand stack

bytecodes.Name: NEWARRAY
bytecodes.Tooltip: NEWARRAY - Create an array in the Heap Memory Area. Array is of a certain data type

bytecodes.Name: IASTORE
bytecodes.Tooltip: IASTORE - Store an int into an array

bytecodes.Name: IALOAD
bytecodes.Tooltip: IALOAD - Load an int from an array

bytecodes.Name: ASTORE
bytecodes.Tooltip: ASTORE - Store a reference to an array into the local variable frame

bytecodes.Name: IMUL
bytecodes.Tooltip: IMUL - Multiply two integers from the operand stack. Push result onto operand stack

bytecodes.Name: IDIV
bytecodes.Tooltip: IDIV - Divide two integers from the operand stack. Push result onto operand stack

bytecodes.Name: IREM
bytecodes.Tooltip: IREM - Divide two integers from operand stack. Push remainder onto operand stack

bytecodes.Name: ICONST_M1
bytecodes.Tooltip: ICONST_M1 - Push -1 onto the operand stack
